channel.title: RSTweets - Oldschool Eco-Spawn Pk Server
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/ioiu86.png[/img]
Hello and welcome to the RSTweets advert post. I'd like to introduce you to a new Spawn PK Server. So whenever you like oldschool servers and you which to PK as soon as possible, then you should give this a go!
[size=36pt][B]Play the Server here:[/B][/size] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/7iwn6s6degao3r3/RSTBeta.jar?dl=1]https://www.dropbox.com/s/7iwn6s6degao3r3/RSTBeta.jar?dl=1[/url]
[B]Main Server Info [/B]
Perfect switching PK Rank system (Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum & Diamond) Spirit Shields Godswords with Working Effects! Custom Drop List Fun PK Area's Great Staff Lots of upcomming updates which you can decide on All Skills Working Safe PK Area PK Points Friendly New Community
[B]Comming Updates[/B] New bosses Blowpipe New Donator Icons Vengeance Timer Player Locate System PK Highscores Vine Whip
[B]Pictures[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/UxiVroe.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Xc0HC0C.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/OOVLtfy.png[/img]
[size=36pt][B]Play the Server here:[/B][/size] [url=https://www.dropbox.com/s/7iwn6s6degao3r3/RSTBeta.jar?dl=1]https://www.dropbox.com/s/7iwn6s6degao3r3/RSTBeta.jar?dl=1[/url]
[/CENTER]
